verses.text_plain: Now it came to pass, when Sanballat, and Tobiah, and Geshem the Arabian, and the rest of our enemies, heard that I had builded the wall, and that there was no breach left therein; (though at that time I had not set up the doors upon the gates;)
verses.verse_html: 1Now it came to pass, when Sanballat, and Tobiah, and Geshem the Arabian, and the rest of our enemies, heard that I had builded the wall, and that there was no breach left therein; (though at that time I had not set up the doors upon the gates;)

tokens.text: Now it came to pass, when Sanballat

verses.text_plain: That Sanballat and Geshem sent unto me, saying, Come, let us meet together in some one of the villages in the plain of Ono. But they thought to do me mischief.
verses.verse_html: 2That Sanballat and Geshem sent unto me, saying, Come, let us meet together in some one of the villages in the plain of Ono. But they thought to do me mischief.

verses.text_plain: And I sent messengers unto them, saying, I am doing a great work, so that I cannot come down: why should the work cease, whilst I leave it, and come down to you?
verses.verse_html: 3And I sent messengers unto them, saying, I am doing a great work, so that I cannot come down: why should the work cease, whilst I leave it, and come down to you?

verses.text_plain: Yet they sent unto me four times after this sort; and I answered them after the same manner.
verses.verse_html: 4Yet they sent unto me four times after this sort; and I answered them after the same manner.

verses.text_plain: Then sent Sanballat his servant unto me in like manner the fifth time with an open letter in his hand;
verses.verse_html: 5Then sent Sanballat his servant unto me in like manner the fifth time with an open letter in his hand;

verses.text_plain: Wherein was written, It is reported among the heathen, and Gashmu saith it, that thou and the Jews think to rebel: for which cause thou buildest the wall, that thou mayest be their king, according to these words.
verses.verse_html:
6Wherein was written, It is reported among the heathen, and Gashmu saith it, that thou and the Jews think to rebel: for which cause thou buildest the wall, that thou mayest be their king, according to these words.
 Gashmu: also called, Geshem

footnotes.body_html: Gashmu: also called, Geshem

verses.text_plain: And thou hast also appointed prophets to preach of thee at Jerusalem, saying, There is a king in Judah: and now shall it be reported to the king according to these words. Come now therefore, and let us take counsel together.
verses.verse_html: 7And thou hast also appointed prophets to preach of thee at Jerusalem, saying, There is a king in Judah: and now shall it be reported to the king according to these words. Come now therefore, and let us take counsel together.

tokens.text: and now shall it be reported
now therefore, and let us take counsel

verses.text_plain: Then I sent unto him, saying, There are no such things done as thou sayest, but thou feignest them out of thine own heart.
verses.verse_html: 8Then I sent unto him, saying, There are no such things done as thou sayest, but thou feignest them out of thine own heart.

tokens.text: them out of thine own heart

verses.text_plain: For they all made us afraid, saying, Their hands shall be weakened from the work, that it be not done. Now therefore, O God, strengthen my hands.
verses.verse_html: 9For they all made us afraid, saying, Their hands shall be weakened from the work, that it be not done. Now therefore, O God, strengthen my hands.

tokens.text: For they all made us afraid

verses.text_plain: Afterward I came unto the house of Shemaiah the son of Delaiah the son of Mehetabeel, who was shut up; and he said, Let us meet together in the house of God, within the temple, and let us shut the doors of the temple: for they will come to slay thee; yea, in the night will they come to slay thee.
verses.verse_html: 10Afterward I came unto the house of Shemaiah the son of Delaiah the son of Mehetabeel, who was shut up; and he said, Let us meet together in the house of God, within the temple, and let us shut the doors of the temple: for they will come to slay thee; yea, in the night will they come to slay thee.

verses.text_plain: And I said, Should such a man as I flee? and who is there, that, being as I am, would go into the temple to save his life? I will not go in.
verses.verse_html: 11And I said, Should such a man as I flee? and who is there, that, being as I am, would go into the temple to save his life? I will not go in.

verses.text_plain: And, lo, I perceived that God had not sent him; but that he pronounced this prophecy against me: for Tobiah and Sanballat had hired him.
verses.verse_html: 12And, lo, I perceived that God had not sent him; but that he pronounced this prophecy against me: for Tobiah and Sanballat had hired him.

verses.text_plain: Therefore was he hired, that I should be afraid, and do so, and sin, and that they might have matter for an evil report, that they might reproach me.
verses.verse_html: 13Therefore was he hired, that I should be afraid, and do so, and sin, and that they might have matter for an evil report, that they might reproach me.

verses.text_plain: My God, think thou upon Tobiah and Sanballat according to these their works, and on the prophetess Noadiah, and the rest of the prophets, that would have put me in fear.
verses.verse_html: 14My God, think thou upon Tobiah and Sanballat according to these their works, and on the prophetess Noadiah, and the rest of the prophets, that would have put me in fear.

tokens.text: that would have put me in fear

verses.text_plain: So the wall was finished in the twenty and fifth day of the month Elul, in fifty and two days.
verses.verse_html: 15So the wall was finished in the twenty and fifth day of the month Elul, in fifty and two days.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, that when all our enemies heard thereof, and all the heathen that were about us saw these things, they were much cast down in their own eyes: for they perceived that this work was wrought of our God.
verses.verse_html: 16And it came to pass, that when all our enemies heard thereof, and all the heathen that were about us saw these things, they were much cast down in their own eyes: for they perceived that this work was wrought of our God.

tokens.text: And it came to pass, that when all our enemies

verses.text_plain: Moreover in those days the nobles of Judah sent many letters unto Tobiah, and the letters of Tobiah came unto them.
verses.verse_html:
17Moreover in those days the nobles of Judah sent many letters unto Tobiah, and the letters of Tobiah came unto them.
 sent: Heb. multiplied their letters passing to Tobiah

footnotes.body_text: sent: Heb. multiplied their letters passing to Tobiah
footnotes.body_html: sent: Heb. multiplied their letters passing to Tobiah

verses.text_plain: For there were many in Judah sworn unto him, because he was the son in law of Shechaniah the son of Arah; and his son Johanan had taken the daughter of Meshullam the son of Berechiah.
verses.verse_html: 18For there were many in Judah sworn unto him, because he was the son in law of Shechaniah the son of Arah; and his son Johanan had taken the daughter of Meshullam the son of Berechiah.

verses.text_plain: Also they reported his good deeds before me, and uttered my words to him. And Tobiah sent letters to put me in fear.
verses.verse_html:
19Also they reported his good deeds before me, and uttered my words to him. And Tobiah sent letters to put me in fear.
 words: or, matters
